title: 193. XANA U RHANDZA KU HANYELA YESU

lines: 1. Xana U Rhandza Ku Hanyela Yesu Ntsena, U Famba Nayena Ndleleni Xana?
Xana Unga Rhuna Ndzwalo Waku Ka Yena, Teka Ku Rhandza Kakwe.
Matimba Yakwe Mangaku Ncica, Ngati Yakwe Yingaku Tiyisa, Rirhandzu Rakwe Ringaku Fambisa, Ku Ya La Ku Faneleke.
2. Xana Wan’wi Amukela Ku Ku Kutsula? U Rhandza Ku Sukela Hinkwaswo Ke?
U Rhandza Ku Pona, U Rhandza Ku Ku Pfuna,
3. Xana U Lava Ku Wisa Mfun’weni Wakwe, Xana U Lava Ku Kuma Ntiyiso,
U Lava Ku N’wi Tirhela Hiku Tshembheka, Teka Ku Rhandza Kakwe.
